entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @WhiteHouse I have never heard anything more disgusting during this night mare we are ALL in !! I have M.S and on a modifier and that makes me at hight risk ,I have had mild symptoms of the covid19 and without my doctors being open i would have been so ill or dead 😔
